name: PIKUMO
description:
PIKUMO is a top-down puzzle platformer set in the cloudy ruins of PIKUMO .Collect all treasure coins scattered all over the once proud Empire of the sky's, but beware, the temple guards are watching you! Use their attacks to progress and advance on your journey with each misstep.

This game was made within 72 hours for the WOWIE! Jam 3.0

The game is functional online in the browser but for the highest quality experience, we recommend downloading it.

CONTROLS
WASD - Movement
Shift - Press shift to run
ESC - Press esc to end the game

TEAM
Marie Günther:  Game Design, Art, Programming, Animation, Ui, UX
Caspar Schirdewahn: Game Design, Programming, Level Design
Timon Farell Wagner: Sound Design, Score, Level Design
